item.title: Being part of "best of 2008"
item.description: I got wonderful news today. Our paper “Specialization and herding behavior of trading firms in a financial market” (pdf) has been selected by the Editorial Board of New Journal of Physics as part of the Journal’s Best of 2008. According to their site, “Best of 2008” is a compilation of articles selected by the Editorial Board and staff team on the basis of criteria including referee endorsements, readership and citation levels and simple broad appeal.
